article.title: Pricing and Quotes
article.summary: Get tips on how to prepare Pro forma invoices and understand the terms of sales.
article.content:
Preparing Quotes for International Buyers

While a sales contract that spells out the details of a transaction is warranted for larger, more complex deals, aquotation in the form of a Pro Forma Invoicemay be sufficient for smaller transactions. Learn how to preparePro forma invoicesand the information they should contain.

Terms of Sale

Terms in international business transactionsoften sound similar to those used in domestic business, but they frequently have very different meanings. For this reason, the exporter must know the terms before preparing a quotation or a pro forma invoice.
